| HistoryText             = 
The fourth Serpent Squad appeared in Las Vegas. The roster consisted of, [[Davis Lawfers (Earth-616)|Copperhead]], [[Teresa Vasquez (Earth-616)|Fer-de-Lance]], [[Gordon Fraley (Earth-616)|Puff Adder]], and [[Ariana Saddiqi (Earth-616)|Black Racer]], committed theft in various casinos along the strip.

Sidewinder witnessed the group defeat at the hand of [[Captain America]] and freed them so they could join the society. The team was actually in the employ of [[Ophelia Sarkissian (Earth-616)|Viper]], who used this as an opportunity to take over the Society. 

Viper failed, but Copperhead, Fer-de-Lance, Puff Adder, and Black Racer remained with the Society. Copperhead later left due to conflict with the Cobra.

==Serpent Squad==
* [[Ophelia Sarkissian (Earth-616)|Viper (Ophelia Sarkissian)]]
* [[Ariana Saddiqi (Earth-616)|Black Racer (Ariana Saddiqi)]], has the power of super speed, Black Racer first joined the fourth Serpent Squad, robbing a casino in Las Vegas. 
* [[Davis Lawfers (Earth-616)|Copperhead (Davis Lawfers)]], wears a suit of armor that is equipped with weaponry and affords him some degree of protection. Copperhead was ordered by the Viper to infiltrate the Serpent Society. 
* [[Gordon Fraley (Earth-616)|Puff Adder (Gordon Fraley)]], is a mutant with Puffadder like powers,depowered after M-Day. 
* [[Teresa Vasquez (Earth-616)|Fer-de-Lance (Teresa Vasquez)]], is skilled in hand-to-hand combat, and the use of sharp weapons, including her talons.
